title: Upper Hand
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss who has the upper hand in the Celtics-Heat series, talk who should be the top pick in the NBA Draft and if Tiger can compete this week.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
